name: Digg - Image Identifier
description:
EDIT: Link's now green & smaller new icon...easy on the eyes

As you all know, Digg.com does not have a picture section! This style is not going to give you one, but what it will do is hightlight the stories that link to...

Filetypes - .jpg, .png, .gif, .bmp & .jpeg
Sites - photobucket.com, flickr.com, bayimg.com, tinypic.com, imageshack.us, deviantart.com & mypicshare.com
Words in url - image, img, photo, potd, piv-of-the-day, pic-of-day & dayinpictures

It is only a quick fix for the picture problem...enjoy

SCREENSHOT
http://s7.photobucket.com/albums/y277/devil_dreg/diggimg2.jpg

DIGG THIS!
http://digg.com/mods/DIGG_Script_to_highlight_picture_stories
css:
/*
 * Digg - Image Identifier
 *
 * Author      : Dreg
 * Created     : July 11th, 2007
 * Updated     : July 11th, 2007
 * Version     : 1.0
 * Website     : http://rdrdreg.deviantart.com
 * Description : Link's to images stand out
 * Usage       : Use with Stylish Firefox extension (http://userstyles.org/) or copy to your Firefox userContent.css file
 */


@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("digg.com") {

/* IMAGES */

a[href*="photobucket.com"],
a[href*="flickr.com"],
a[href*="bayimg.com"],
a[href*="tinypic.com"],
a[href*="imageshack.us"],
a[href*="deviantart.com"],
a[href*="mypicshare.com"],
a[href*=".jpg"],
a[href*=".png"],
a[href*=".gif"],
a[href*=".bmp"],
a[href*=".jpeg"],
a[href*="image"],
a[href*="img"],
a[href*="photo"],
a[href*="potd"],
a[href*="pic-of-the-day"],
a[href*="pic-of-day"],
a[href*="dayinpictures"]
{color: #33CC66 !important;}

a[href*="photobucket.com"]:visited,
a[href*="flickr.com"]:visited,
a[href*="bayimg.com"]:visited,
a[href*="tinypic.com"]:visited,
a[href*="imageshack.us"]:visited,
a[href*="deviantart.com"]:visited,
a[href*="mypicshare.com"]:visited,
a[href*=".jpg"]:visited,
a[href*=".png"]:visited,
a[href*=".gif"]:visited,
a[href*=".bmp"]:visited,
a[href*=".jpeg"]:visited,
a[href*="image"]:visited,
a[href*="images"]:visited,
a[href*="img"]:visited,
a[href*="photo"]:visited,
a[href*="potd"]:visited,
a[href*="pic-of-the-day"]:visited,
a[href*="pic-of-day"]:visited,
a[href*="dayinpictures"]:visited
{color: #55ff55 !important;}

a[href*="photobucket.com"]:hover,
a[href*="flickr.com"]:hover,
a[href*="bayimg.com"]:hover,
a[href*="tinypic.com"]:hover,
a[href*="imageshack.us"]:hover,
a[href*="deviantart.com"]:hover,
a[href*="mypicshare.com"]:hover,
a[href*=".jpg"]:hover,
a[href*=".png"]:hover,
a[href*=".gif"]:hover,
a[href*=".bmp"]:hover,
a[href*=".jpeg"]:hover,
a[href*="image"]:hover,
a[href*="images"]:hover,
a[href*="img"]:hover,
a[href*="photo"]:hover,
a[href*="potd"]:hover,
a[href*="pic-of-the-day"]:hover,
a[href*="pic-of-day"]:hover,
a[href*="dayinpictures"]:hover
{color: #000000 !important;}

a[href*="photobucket.com"]:before,
a[href*="flickr.com"]:before,
a[href*="bayimg.com"]:before,
a[href*="tinypic.com"]:before,
a[href*="imageshack.us"]:before,
a[href*="deviantart.com"]:before,
a[href*="mypicshare.com"]:before,
a[href*=".jpg"]:before,
a[href*=".png"]:before,
a[href*=".gif"]:before,
a[href*=".bmp"]:before,
a[href*=".jpeg"]:before,
a[href*="image"]:before,
a[href*="images"]:before,
a[href*="img"]:before,
a[href*="photo"]:before,
a[href*="potd"]:before,
a[href*="pic-of-the-day"]:before,
a[href*="pic-of-day"]:before,
a[href*="dayinpictures"]:before
{content: url(http://i7.photobucket.com/albums/y277/devil_dreg/camera_icon.gif) !important ;  }

a[class="simple"] {display: none !important;}
}
